name: Snail Classic Collection - VX Ace
description:
A collection of a few short RPG Maker VX Ace games I made when I was younger, now uploaded here in one big collection!

Do note most of these are 3-5 years old so their quality doesn't reflect my current ability, or personal opinions on various things, if there's anything offensive I deeply apologies as while I'm a better person now I was kinda shitty back when I made some of these games, however I hope you enjoy what there is to see anyway!

List of games:

Scary a Game (Finished) 2015

Scary a Game 2 (Modified to fix the inability to beat it) (Finished) 2015

Journey to Castle Senpai (Edited to remove references of my former name) (Cancelled) 2015

Clicker Game (Short prototype) ???

Journey of a Smith (Short prototype) ???
